expo.name: NutriVision

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.

expo.description:
NutriVision is an app that uses OCR (Optical Character Recognition) to read nutritional labels, on packaged foods and automatically compiles a list of what induviduals are not eating enough off and what they are eating too much of.

Made for HooHacks 2022
